com.rcextract.minecord

Class JSONMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rcextract.minecord.JSONMessage

  • public class JSONMessage
extends Object
    This is a complete JSON message builder class. To create a new JSONMessage do create(String)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JSONMessage.ClickEvent 
      static class  JSONMessage.HoverEvent 
      static class  JSONMessage.MessageEvent
      Represents the JSON format that all click/hover events in JSON messages must follow.
      class  JSONMessage.MessagePart
      Defines a section of the message, and represents the format that all JSON messages must follow in Minecraft.

        public JSONMessage changePage(int page)

      • bar

        public JSONMessage bar()
        Adds a horizontal bar to the message that's 53 characters long. This is the default width of the player's chat window.
        Returns:
        This JSONMessage instance
